cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16) project(proceduraltexture LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Qml Quick Quick3D)
qt_add_executable(proceduraltexture main.cpp )
set_target_properties(proceduraltexture PROPERTIES WIN32_EXECUTABLE TRUE MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE )
target_link_libraries(proceduraltexture PUBLIC Qt::Core Qt::Gui Qt::Quick Qt::Quick3D )
qt_add_qml_module(proceduraltexture URI ProceduralTextureExample VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES Main.qml SOURCES gradienttexture.cpp gradienttexture.h RESOURCE_PREFIX "/qt/qml" IMPORTS QtQuick3D )
install(TARGETS proceduraltexture BUNDLE DESTINATION . RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR} LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR} )
qt_generate_deploy_qml_app_script( TARGET proceduraltexture OUTPUT_SCRIPT deploy_script MACOS_BUNDLE_POST_BUILD NO_UNSUPPORTED_PLATFORM_ERROR DEPLOY_USER_QML_MODULES_ON_UNSUPPORTED_PLATFORM ) install(SCRIPT ${deploy_script})
